mapper.select: SELECT no, title, writer, writedate FROM board ORDER BY no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(NO, TITLE, WRITER, PASSWORD, CONTENT, writedate, group_no, group_order, indent,fileName) VALUES (NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, #{password}, #{content}, SYSDATE, NO_SEQ.CURRVAL,0,0, #{fileName})
mapper.select: SELECT no, title,writer, writeDate, group_no, group_order, indent, deletestatus, parentNo, fileName,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reply WHERE no=b.no) replyCount FROM (SELECT no, title, writer, writedate, group_no, group_order, indent,deletestatus,parentNo,replyCount,fileName,row_number() over(ORDER BY group_no DESC) rNum FROM (SELECT no, title,writer, writeDate, group_no, group_order, indent, deletestatus, parentNo,fileName,replyCount FROM board ORDER BY group_order ASC) ) b WHERE rNum BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY group_no DESC, group_order
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (no, title, writer, content, password, writedate, group_no, group_order, indent, deletestatus, parentNo,fileName) VALUES (NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{password}, SYSDATE, #{groupNo}, #{groupOrder}+1, (SELECT NVL(max(#{indent}),1)+1 FROM board WHERE group_no = #{groupNo} AND indent = #{indent}), DEFAULT, NO_SEQ.CURRVAL,#{fileName})
